name: Total Event - Empty Fields
fullName: Assurdly | Receiver API/Events Records#Total Event - Empty Fields
descriptionHtml:
### Get Producer Total Events

This API endpoint is used to retrieve total events for a specific producer from the dashboard.

#### Request Body

- `request_type` (string, optional): Type of request.

- `product_type` (string, optional): Type of product.

- `fqs_type` (string): Type of FQS.

- `from_date` (string): Start date for the event search.

- `to_date` (string): End date for the event search.

- `product_category` (string, optional): Category of the product.


#### Response Body

The response is in JSON format and follows the schema below:

``` json
{
"Data": [
{
"event_id": "",
"events_comments": [
{
"_id": "",
"event_id": "",
"comments": "",
"user_name": "",
"timestamp": ""
}
],
"event_type": "",
"event_location": {
"id": "",
"name": ""
},
"trading_partner": {
"id": "",
"name": ""
},
"activity": {
"type": "",
"no": ""
},
"data_capture_time": "",
"batches": [
{
"type": "",
"manufacturer": {
"id": "",
"type": ""
},
"product": {
"id": "",
"type": ""
},
"product_instance": {
"id": "",
"type": ""
}
}
]
}
],
"Filters": {
"manufacturer": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"tradPartner": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"eventLocation": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"productId": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"activityType": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"activityNumber": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
],
"prodInstance": [
{
"value": "",
"label": ""
}
]
}
}

```
